Text: Not now, the split is too great and there is no way to get Treasury back in line except with a Nixon Shock. The private banking system cannot keep up with the 10% increase in interest charges that Treasury is looking at.
Cause: Not now, the split is too great and there is no way to get Treasury back in line except with a Nixon Shock.
Effect: The private banking system cannot keep up with the 10% increase in interest charges that Treasury is looking at.
Sentence: <e1>Not now, the split is too great and there is no way to get Treasury back in line except with a Nixon Shock.</e1> <e2>The private banking system cannot keep up with the 10% increase in interest charges that Treasury is looking at.</e2>
